message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its value far exceeds $1200000, reflecting its unique features and unparalleled performance. For a limited time, we are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. Please let us know if you would like to explore this opportunity further.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this price?
